/opt/rocm/bin/hipcc  -fsanitize=address --offload-arch=gfx90a:xnack+ -shared-libsan -O3 -DNDEBUG  -pthread CMakeFiles/test_opt_static.dir/hipMain1.cpp.o  -o test_opt_static  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib -lHipOptLibrary -L/home/taccuser/asan/samples/2_Cookbook/15_static_library/host_functions/build -lamdhip64 /opt/rocm/lib/libamd_comgr.so.2.6.60100 /opt/rocm/lib/libhsa-runtime64.so.1.12.60100
